urn:cts:demo:demodocs.mixedpoem.local01:2.2#6#5#7#/TEI/text/body/div[@type = 'book' and @n='2']#<l n="2">δεινήν, ᾗ σὺν Ἄρηϊ μέλει πολεμήϊα ἔργα</l>#/TEI/text/body/div[@type = 'book' and @n='?']/l[@n = '?']
urn:cts:demo:demodocs.mixedpoem.local01:2.3#7#6#8#/TEI/text/body/div[@type = 'book' and @n='2']#<l n="3">περθόμεναί τε πόληες ἀϋτή τε πτόλεμοί τε,</l>#/TEI/text/body/div[@type = 'book' and @n='?']/l[@n = '?']
